channel.title: Comments on: Quote This for Truth, Bitch

item.title: By: Fantasia
item.dc:creator: Fantasia
item.description: Due to the fact that the word fag is reclaimed for myself I find to be postive and not negative in conitation but then agien I could just be a silly Fag!
item.content:encoded: Due to the fact that the word fag is reclaimed for myself I find to be postive and not negative in conitation but then agien I could just be a silly Fag!

item.title: By: Anon
item.dc:creator: Anon
item.description:
Yup, UnionCarbide has it right - the SA mods smack down the catchphrase crap. Meh, it's kids who want to "fit in" who spout the same cliche crap, no matter what forum, online or otherwise.
So it just makes it easier to find the wannabes.
item.content:encoded:
Yup, UnionCarbide has it right – the SA mods smack down the catchphrase crap. Meh, it’s kids who want to “fit in” who spout the same cliche crap, no matter what forum, online or otherwise.

So it just makes it easier to find the wannabes.

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Werd.
Which also drives me insane with rage.
item.content:encoded:
Werd.

Which also drives me insane with rage.

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description: Another one I'm getting sick of is "Oh snap".
item.content:encoded: Another one I’m getting sick of is “Oh snap”.

item.title: By: UnionCarbide
item.dc:creator: UnionCarbide
item.description: SomethingAwful's forum mods will give you a 1 day suspension for quoting for truth, for a first offense. I think if you're aggressive about it it will earn you a ban.
item.content:encoded: SomethingAwful’s forum mods will give you a 1 day suspension for quoting for truth, for a first offense. I think if you’re aggressive about it it will earn you a ban.

item.title: By: Chef
item.dc:creator: Chef
item.description:
"4tw" is the most annoying saying of all time.
everytime i read that i find a child to punch right in the mouth. so next time you think of saying that faggy phrase i hope you picture a little kid shitting his teeth for days.
item.content:encoded:
“4tw” is the most annoying saying of all time.

everytime i read that i find a child to punch right in the mouth. so next time you think of saying that faggy phrase i hope you picture a little kid shitting his teeth for days.

item.title: By: Ethic
item.dc:creator: Ethic
item.description:
<blockquote>Finster said: quoted for truth</blockquote>
Nice one, retard.
item.content:encoded:
Finster said: quoted for truth

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.description:
<blockquote>Q4T was mildly interesting the first time I read it, oh ... about TWO YEARS AGO, but it's overuse factor is rivaling 'I'm Rick James, bitch.' Enough already. It was amusing, entertaining, interesting once, twice, maybe 6 times, but not dozens.</blockquote>
quoted for truth
item.content:encoded:
Q4T was mildly interesting the first time I read it, oh … about TWO YEARS AGO, but it’s overuse factor is rivaling ‘I’m Rick James, bitch.’ Enough already. It was amusing, entertaining, interesting once, twice, maybe 6 times, but not dozens.

quoted for truth
